article:
If you are in a supermarket and find no cashiers   in it,  _ you give money for the things?
 _  neighbours are having a test of honesty   now. The supermarket in our _ has a special area. People can buy small things  _ pens and knives in this area. They need to scan   their things, and then put the  _  into a box themselves  . No one  watches them. All of them like to be honest persons. The special area is running very _  now. Hundreds of people shop here every day. The _ of the supermarket says he will not _ this area.
I think the supermarket is doing a great _ . Do you think so?
